title: Reducing Computed Tomography Use for Appendicitis Evaluation in a Pediatric Emergency Department: A Multidisciplinary Quality Improvement Initiative
details: J Hockenbury, ME Lopez, CM Godfrey, ML Blakely… - Pediatric Quality & Safety, 2025
abstract: Methods: From September 2021 to October 2022, we conducted a multidisciplinary quality improvement initiative among patients evaluated for appendicitis in the pediatric emergency department (PED). Interventions included standardizing …
